resources.string: Are you sure you want to sign out?
To reset your mailbox password, please use the web version of ProtonMail at protonmail.com
Impossible to load content. Please enable Chrome
Impossible to load content. Please install Chrome
You are not signed up for the ProtonMail Android Beta
Your ProtonMail app cannot be used until it is updated
ProtonMail is currently offline, check our twitter for the current status: https://twitter.com/protonmail
Contact saved, will be synced when connection is available
Message sending failed. Your messages are saved in drafts folder
Please remove and re-attach \"%s\" and send the message again. Your message can be found in the "Drafts" folder.
Are you sure you want to delete all messages from this folder?
The message %1$s cannot have more than %2$d labels.
Maximum attachments per message has been reached
Maximum attachments size per message has been reached
There was a problem taking a photo
There was a problem adding the selected file
Are you sure? This cannot be undone.
Offline! Report will be submitted when online
The address \'%s\' is invalid and was removed
Please add at least one recipient
Expiration times can only be set on fully encrypted messages. Please set a password for your non-ProtonMail recipients.
Attachments are limited to %1$s. Total attached would be %2$s.
Settings not saved - incorrect login password
Settings not saved - invalid notification email
Set a password to encrypt this message for non-ProtonMail users
Invalid Display Name. \'>\' and \'<\' are not allowed
We will send a verification code to the email address above.
We will send a verification code to the phone number above.
Keep me updated about new features
Note: This is used to encrypt and decrypt your messages. Do not lose this password, we cannot recover it. If you lose your password, you will not be able to read your emails.
Note: The Username is also your ProtonMail address
By using ProtonMail, you agree to our\n terms and conditions and privacy policy
To prevent abuse of ProtonMail,\nwe need to verify that you are human.
Please select one of the following options:
The highest level of encryption available. Can take several minutes to setup.
Label not added due to invalid name.
Can not reply/forward, this message isn\'t sent yet
Please install a browser app in order to finish this action
No app found to handle this action
No app found to handle this action or invalid URL
Error while deleting some messages. Some of the selected messages are in sending process?!
Maximum length for a username is %d characters!
Your new secure email\naccount is ready.
The optional recovery email address allows you to reset your login password if you forget it.
When you send an email, this is the name that appears in the sender field.
Your new encrypted email account has been set up and is ready to send and receive encrypted messages.
You can customize swipe gestures in the ProtonMail App Settings.
Create and add Labels to organize your inbox. Press and hold down on a message for all options.

Your inbox is now protected with end-to-end encryption. To automatically send secure emails to your contacts, invite them to use ProtonMail! You can also manually encrypt messages to them if they don\'t use ProtonMail.
Messages you send can be set to auto delete after a certain time period.
You can get help and support at protonmail.com/support. Bugs can also be reported with the app.
Please wait %d seconds to click again
Access to this account is disabled due to non-payment. Please sign in through protonmail.com to pay your unpaid invoice.
Mobile signups are temporarily disabled. Please try again later, or try signing up at protonmail.com using a desktop or laptop computer.
The emails contained here will be found in All Mails
Enter your PIN to unlock your Inbox
Enter your PIN to unlock your Message
PIN is invalid, enter correct 4 digit PIN
Ringtone selection returned an invalid value
Impossible to load a default Ringtone

You are about to launch the web browser and navigate to:

%s

Do you want to continue?
Changes will take effect after closing the app
Are you sure you want to log out?
ProtonMail is free and open source
We need your support to continue protecting privacy and improving ProtonMail
Everything included in our Free plan
For plans with more storage, upgrade through the ProtonMail webmail interface.
Thank you for being a paid user!
ProtonMail is a free service for the public good. You can help support online privacy by selecting a paid account.
Send up to 1000 messages per day
Send encrypted messages to external recipients
Help pick new features through Visionary only polls
coming soon for organizations to enjoy encrypted email!
By clicking Submit, you agree to abide by\nProtonMail\'s terms and conditions
You will need to login to your PayPal account to complete this transaction. We will open new browser window with PayPal for you.
We are now upgrading your account, please wait a moment. Thank you for your support!
Warning: You did not set a recovery email so account recovery is impossible if you forget your password. Proceed without recovery email?
An error occurred while trying to verify your payment method. Please try again or switch to another card.
Payment method verification cancelled. Please try again or switch to another card.
Payment method already used for this payment. Please check status of your subscription.
You have no saved payment methods.
Please log in through protonmail.com to edit billing information.
Email address does not match or is invalid
If this option is enabled, the app will sync with the server in the background. Disabling this feature will disable push notifications.
Please select only Local Phone Contacts
Please upgrade to use encrypted contact information.
You have been logged out. Please login again.
There was a problem logging into your account on Android. Please contact customer support from the Web client.
For security reasons, please verify that you are not a robot.
Please verify you are a human before sending this message: %s
Message not sent - verification required. Your messages are saved in drafts folder.
There are unsaved entries in the form. Are you sure you want to discard them?
Request timed out, please try again
Folder not created due to invalid name.
The message %1$s cannot have more than %2$d labels.
This email seems to be from a ProtonMail address but came from outside our system and failed our authentication requirements. It may be spoofed or improperly forwarded!
This email has failed its domain\'s authentication requirements. It may be spoofed or improperly forwarded!
This message may be a phishing attempt. Please check the sender and contents to make sure they are legitimate. LEARN MORE
Verification of this content\'s signature failed
Upgrade to a paid plan to send from your %s address.
This will upload the local contacts on your device to your ProtonMail contacts directory. You will then be able to access these contacts on your other devices through ProtonMail.
Email address is not valid for some of your contacts
Sending messages from @pm.me address is a paid feature. Your message will be sent from your default address %s
Upgrade to a paid plan to be able to set your %s address as default
Sets the maximum amount storage space ProtonMail can use on your mobile device.
Embedded images loading failed. Please check your network connection.
Do you want to send with an untrusted key?
You have enabled Address Verification with Trusted Keys for %s, but no active encryption keys have been trusted.
Do you want to re-sign the contact?

The verification of %s has failed: the contact is not signed correctly. You must re-sign the contact in order to send a message to this address or edit the contact. This can also happen when you have recovered your password and reset your keys.
Sent by you with end-to-end encryption
Sent by ProtonMail with zero access encryption
End-to-end encrypted message from verified address
Recipient could not be found: %s and it has been removed
An error occurred while retrieving recipient information and the recipient has been removed: %s
You enabled message expiration, but not all recipients support this.
Please add a message password for the following recipients:
Please disable PGP sending to enable expiration for the following recipients:
Tap send anyway to send without expiration to these recipients.
Shows all ongoing operations like new message download on background
Reporting a message as a phishing attempt will send the message to us, so we can analyze it and improve our filters. This means that we will be able to see the contents of the message in full.
Report sent. Message moved to spam.
You can be simultaneously logged into an unlimited number of paid ProtonMail accounts and one free account.
Please upgrade to a paid plan for these premium features

Are you sure you want to delete the selected groups?

resources.string: Storage limit reached. Unable to send or receive emails. Press to learn more.
You have reached 100% of your storage capacity. You won’t be able to send or receive emails unless you permanently delete some emails or purchase more storage.
You have reached 90% of your storage capacity. Consider freeing up some space or purchasing more storage before you run out of capacity.
In order to add attachments you need to allow access to storage.
Push notifications for ProtonMail do not work without updated Google Play services.
Changing the Mobile Signature is allowed to Paid users only

plurals.name: quick_snooze_resume_min
plurals.item: Notifications will resume in less than a minute

resources.string: Notifications will resume in %1$d hours and %2$d mins
Quick Snooze and Scheduled Snooze active
Quick Snooze and Scheduled Snooze disabled

When this option is enabled, messaged bodies will be automatically downloaded each time you receive a new email notification (this will consume more data). If this option is not enabled, message bodies will only be downloaded when you open an email. (Note: with either option, if you clear the cache or log out, you will not be able to read message bodies while offline.)
Turn this feature on to see the sender\nof the emails in the push notifications.
Turn this feature on to auto-lock your\napp and use a PIN code or fingerprint\nto unlock it.

In case Proton sites are blocked, this setting allows the app to try alternative network routing to reach Proton, which can be useful for bypassing firewalls or network issues. We recommend keeping this setting on for greater reliability.

In case Proton sites are blocked, this setting allows the app to try alternative network routing to reach Proton, which can be useful for bypassing firewalls or network issues. We recommend keeping this setting on for greater reliability. Learn more
Turn this feature on to auto-complete email addresses using contacts from all your logged in accounts.
Logged out from %1$s and signed in with %2$s
You cannot add another free ProtonMail account. Only one free ProtonMail account can be added. Please logout of your other free account or upgrade one of your free accounts to a paid account.

The account you are trying to add does not have generated keys. Please add this account as a first account on the app, or log in via the web version, to generate keys and then add it as a additional account in the app.

No internet connection - Please make sure that your internet connection is working.

Internet Service Provider (ISP) problem - Try connecting to Proton from a different network (or use ProtonVPN or Tor).

Government block - Your country may be blocking access to Proton. Try ProtonVPN (or any other VPN) or Tor to access Proton.

Antivirus interference - Temporarily disable or remove your antivirus software.

Proxy/Firewall interference - Disable any proxies or firewalls, or contact your network administrator.

Proton is down - Check Proton Status for our system status.

Still can’t find a solution - Contact us directly through our support form, email (support@protonmail.com), or Twitter.
Error while saving message. Try again.
After last update swipe gestures have been switched. If you want, you can reset them in the settings.
Invalid Firebase API key. Push notifications will not work.
Failed saving online draft for message: "%s"
Can\'t open this message while it\'s being sent
